name: Blood Test
description: A common test used to analyze blood samples.

name: Urine Test
description: Analysis of urine samples to detect various conditions.

name: ECG
description: Test to record the electrical activity of the heart.

name: Stool Test
description: Analysis of stool samples to detect gastrointestinal conditions.

name: Allergy Test
description: Test to identify allergic reactions to specific substances.

name: Pregnancy Test
description: Test to detect pregnancy through urine or blood samples.

name: Cholesterol Test
description: Test to measure the level of cholesterol in the blood.

name: Thyroid Function Test
description: Test to evaluate thyroid gland function.

name: Liver Function Test
description: Test to assess liver health and function.

name: Kidney Function Test
description: Test to evaluate kidney function and detect kidney diseases.
